[[div class="blockquote"]]

[[=]]
+ {{ABRETHE: THE SERIES: SEASON I}}
[[/=]]

**[[[scp-7790|Abrethe: Talking Robot Heads]]]** -- Where a weird piece of scrap talks to Neil and Abie about croissants.
**[[[scp-6266|Abrethe: The Stoplight]]]** -- Where Abbie and Felix teleport into your walls.
**[[[scp-4927|Abrethe: The Church of the Broken Fish]]]** -- Where Abrethe discovers something dark, something very, very dark.
**[[[scp-6175|Abrethe: Project ANTISPIN]]]** -- Where Abigail meets her antithesis: The //Voyager 2// probe, which pretty much is a chatterbox.
**[[[scp-6255|Abrethe: Coffeeslip]]]** -- Where Abi dies of a coffee stain.

[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]

[[=]]
+ {{ABRETHE: THE SERIES: SEASON II}}
[[/=]]

**[[[scp-5961|Abrethe in... BEWARE THE BUOYANCY!]]]** -- They come from outer waters, and so do the Avocados.
**[[[no-matter-what|Abrethe: Begone, faerie!]]]** -- Where Abe reads a short story about a very long story.
**[[[scp-6082|Abrethe: The Claimed Throne]]]** -- Where Abbi yeets a rocket into Jupiter for some reason.
**[[[scp-7171|Abrethe: Weather Alert]]]** -- Where Earth ends and Albert, Mayo Man and THE Octopus launch yet another rocket to outer space.
**[[[doat-orientation|Abrethe: Wizards With Guns]]]** -- Where that guy Abbett shows you how to make and shoot a magic gun. Currently undergoing the rewriting process.

[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]

[[=]]
+ {{ABRETHE: THE SERIES: KAUSI KOLME???}}
[[/=]]

**[[[scp-7255|Abrethe: Stuck in the Sauna]]]** -- Where the sauna tax results in a grave misunderstanding for Abigail Lacroix.
**[[[scp-7445|Abrethe: Russian Treasure Hunt]]]** -- Where the article is nicknamed "Saluting Jack". Did you get the pun?
**[# Abrethe: The Petsamo Conqueror]** -- Where Anvilgail doesn't get a chance against the Honorary Magyar Mekhanite March of the Former Great Principality of Petsamo.
**[# Abrethe: Yleisradio Oy x VKTM Finnish Holiday Special]** -- Where Vikander-Kneed Technical Media breaks the format.

[[tabview]]
[[tab ABIPAGE INTRO]]

Welcome to the ABRETHE HUB, also known as the ROUNDABOUT PAGE! This is the author page / dumpster / interdepartmental deep state operation to steal your soul / hellhole where you and I can see almost everything I've posted in my entire SCP history.

This essentially is the epitome of the ABRETHE anthology. As such, you've just agreed and signed up to slurp on an Abishake™, or in other words, you're looking for either a work of mine or you just want to take my information. 

If you're looking for the prior, good! That's all good, and it certainly amuses me no matter how bad your intentions are. If you're looking for the latter, you are such a mere, vile and miserable gobbly goober.

[[/tab]]
[[tab WHO IS ABI?]]

Hello! I'm Abigail. I'm gonna copypaste my Twitter portfolio because I'm too lazy.

> "Hello! I'm Abigail. I'm an amateur artist from Spain who loves to goof around oftentimes."
> 
> "I don't make commissions. That means I'm either not responsible enough to work on an image for you, or I'm just too busy doing my own stuff."
> 
> "Feel free to DM me if you want!"

In case you're not satisfied with my marvelous, wondertastic Twitter portfolio, here's some additional things you can know about me:

* I'm 18, even if I've been decommissioning the goofmobs since Tweetfall™ 2192. That's not a matter of age. Please, support the cause.
* There are 4 things I'll ever write about in this site, but probably because they're my favorite topics: Nature, space, paratechnology/sci-fi, and goofy goobsters. My best examples of that are 4927, 6175/7171, 6082 and 6266.
* I am an Arctic geography nerd. My settings mostly take place in subarctic areas such as the Northwest Territories or Alaska, or sometimes even space (I love you, {{Sputnik Planitia}}).
* When it comes to music, I mostly listen to Led Zeppelin, Black Sabbath or Talking Heads. On top of all of these bands, there comes Tally Hall and Will Wood & The Tapeworms. I also listen to synth and chillwave, among other things.
* I have an AA, yes.
* I'm gay.

[[/tab]]
[[tab AND YOU MAY ASK YOURSELF...]]

As I said before, I have an author avatar which I haven't played much with yet. Here's a bit of info about her.

[[div class="blockquote"]]

**Name:** Abigail Wendell Lacroix

**Position:** Level 3 Historian

**Nationality:** American/Canadian

**DOB:** 17/12/1998

**Assigned Site:** SCP Foundation Alaskan Paratechnological Research and Experimental Exploration Facility (Site-94)

**Assigned Departments:** SYNTECH Division, Department of Anthropology; Department of Para-Astronomy (In Timeline 7171-ALPHA).[[footnote]]**Side note:** On the 7171 timeline, Abigail is a non-binary para-astronomer known as Albert Lacroix. __This is the only exception.__[[/footnote]]

[[/div]]

I'll be adding more information as I write about her. Feel free to use her in whatever you want, be it your SCPs, your tales, your shitposts, your fanart...

[[/tab]]
[[/tabview]]
